markdownRemark.html:
Hello there!

This blog is a place for me to keep a journal of sorts of the projects that I am currently working on, as well as those that I've worked on. I'll try to include some of my thoughts, what I've learned, the challenges faced as well as resources that I had found useful in the process.

If you're interested (for whatever reasons), you can find more details or contact me here.

Cheers!
